item.description:
Laughter Yoga is an incredibly fun, incredibly effective way to release stress and bring more joy into your life! Laughter Yoga involves intentional laughter, deep breathing, and simple games that encourage child-like playfulness.

Recommended by Dr. Andrew Weil and Oprah. No special flexibility required! Wear comfortable clothes and bring a water bottle.  Leave the yoga mat at home.

Class fee:  $16 plus tax

Teacher Bio: Laura Le is one of the most popular Laughter Yoga instructors in Connecticut. She trained with Katie West at the Levity Institute and is certified by Laughter Yoga International.

Laughter Yoga has changed Laura's life in so many beautiful ways. She is much happier and healthier. She is more confident and resilient. And she has made many warm-hearted friends from her classes. She loves to see people leave class blissful and peaceful. Her hope is that everyone discovers the pleasure and healing power of laughing for no reason.

 

We hope you'll laugh with us and check out Downtown Yoga, the coolest new hang out in downtown Hartford.  Downtown Yoga is a creative community space used for art openings, salsa classes, eco-cycling, networking meetings for entrepreneurs, and, of course, yoga classes.

Free street parking after 6 pm. To get a discount on parking in the nearby garage, download the coupon on the Downtown Yoga website: http://www.downtownyogastudios.com/
item.name: Get Your Laugh On at Downtown Yoga!
